name: SPC Audit Trail
description: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 compliant audit trail for SPC data integrity and traceability

fields.name: v4bk3hhcg1
fields.label: Record ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for the audit record

fields.name: v4ba166efa
fields.label: Timestamp
fields.description: Exact date and time of the action

fields.name: v4blj4d3kv
fields.label: User ID
fields.description: User who performed the action

fields.name: v4b51u3t82
fields.label: Action Type
fields.options:
Create
Read
Update
Delete
Print
Export
Sign
Approve
Reject
fields.description: Type of action performed on the record

fields.name: v4bh0a5l5k
fields.label: Table Name
fields.description: Name of the database table/document type affected

fields.name: v4bqc8lhr8
fields.label: Record Name
fields.description: Name/ID of the specific record affected

fields.name: v4baqugqt8
fields.label: Field Changed
fields.description: Name of the field that was modified (if applicable)

fields.name: v4bhdvf2ug
fields.label: Old Value
fields.description: Previous value before change

fields.name: v4bqcrppru
fields.label: New Value
fields.description: New value after change

fields.name: v4bm8vtc2v
fields.label: IP Address
fields.description: IP address of the user's computer

fields.name: v4b77n4rh0
fields.label: Computer Name
fields.description: Name or identifier of the computer used

fields.name: v4bgf013mh
fields.label: Browser Information
fields.description: Browser type and version information

fields.name: v4bqc7j4p9
fields.label: Session ID
fields.description: Unique session identifier

fields.name: v4bm51fgtg
fields.label: Electronic Signature
fields.description: Electronic signature hash if action was signed

fields.name: v4blo8lh9s
fields.label: Signature Meaning
fields.description: Meaning or purpose of the electronic signature

fields.name: v4bcn8uf02
fields.label: Date Time Stamp
fields.description: Regulatory timestamp for signature

fields.name: v4bse8mnou
fields.label: Checksum
fields.description: Data integrity checksum

fields.name: v4bjio260b
fields.label: Hash Value
fields.description: Cryptographic hash for tamper detection

fields.name: v4bgnqrsp2
fields.label: Tamper Evidence
fields.description: Flag indicating if tampering is detected

fields.name: v4bai5lq62
fields.label: Backup Status
fields.description: Status of record backup for compliance
